alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pender, northern Brunswick and central Columbus Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm along the Brunswick and Columbus County line between Nakina, Winnabow, and Delco. The storms were moving to the northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bethel, Northwest, Makatoka, Freeland, Honey Island, Nakina, Old Dock, Mollie, Exum, Bughill, Batarora, Freeman, Pireway, Dulah, Ash, Phoenix, Delco, Riegelwood, Crusoe Island and Sandy Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
